methods.description:
Get a range of General Ledger Transactions - ScreenId=GL404000
Please use a page size lower or equal to the allowed max page size which is returned under metadata. 
If pagesize is greater than the max page size, it will be limited to max page size.

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: The branch CD

parameters.name: ledger
parameters.description: Mandatory. The ledger in which you want to view the account balances.

parameters.name: fromPeriod
parameters.description: The financial period that begins the date range of the batches you want to view. Format YYYYPP

parameters.name: toPeriod
parameters.description: The financial period that ends the date range of the batches you want to view. Format YYYYPP

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: The account CD for which you want to view activities in the selected financial period.

parameters.name: subaccountId
parameters.description: The Subaccount

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: The first date of the interval within the period. Format YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: The last date of the interval within the selected period. Format YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: includeUnposted
parameters.description: Checkmark indicating if unposted batches are included.

parameters.name: includeUnreleased
parameters.description: Checkmark indicating if unreleased (balanced) batches are included.

parameters.name: skipRecords
parameters.description: This field has been deprecated and will be removed in future versions. Use pagenumber and pagesize for pagination purposes. Pagenumber and pagesize does not work with NumberToRead and SkipRecords.

parameters.name: numberToRead
parameters.description: This field has been deprecated and will be removed in future versions. Use pagenumber and pagesize for pagination purposes. Pagenumber and pagesize does not work with NumberToRead and SkipRecords.

parameters.name: lastModifiedDateTime
parameters.description:
This value, generated by the system, indicates the last time the record was modified. Use it to retrieve all records that have been modified since that time, up to the present.

Accepted format:
* ```yyyy-MM-dd```
* ```yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss```
* ```yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.FFF```
* ```yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss```
* ```yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.FFF```

_Note:_ __LastModifiedDateTime__ and __LastModifiedDateTimeCondition__ are __mutually inclusive__.

parameters.name: lastModifiedDateTimeCondition
parameters.description:
This value represents the condition to be applied when retrieving records.

Accepted values (without the single quotes):
* '>' for greater than
* '<' for less than
* '>=' for greater than or equal
* '<=' for less than or equal

_Note:_ __LastModifiedDateTime__ and __LastModifiedDateTimeCondition__ are __mutually inclusive__.

parameters.name: expandAccountInfo
parameters.description:
By default, if no value is provided, False and the account information will include only Number, Description, Type and GlConsolAccountCD.
If True, each transaction returned will include extended information about account.

parameters.name: expandBranchInfo
parameters.description:
By default, if no value is provided, False and branch information will include only branch number.
If True, each transaction returned will include extended information about Branch (number and name).

parameters.name: includeTransactionBalance
parameters.description:
By default, if no value is provided, False and the transactions returned will not include their balances (fields BegBalance, EndingBalance, CurrBegBalance, CurrEndingBalance)
If True, each transaction returned will include its balance.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Pagination parameter. Page number.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description:
Pagination parameter. Number of items to be collected.
Please use a page size lower or equal to the allowed max page size which is returned as part of the metadata information.
If requested page size is greater than allowed max page size, request will be limited to max page size.

parameters.name: erpApiBackground
parameters.description: If a URL value is provided, then API endpoint will be queued and executed in background. When the execution of the background operation is finished, the system will POST the response to the specified URL. The endpoint itself responds in this case with a 202-Accepted status and a reference to a state document for the background operation.

parameters.description: This field does not work and has been deprecated. It will be removed in future versions.

parameters.name: numberToRead
parameters.description:
[This field has been deprecated and will be removed in future versions. Use pagenumber and pagesize for pagination purposes. Pagenumber and pagesize does not work with NumberToRead and SkipRecords.]
Tells the service to return only {numberToRead} number of records.

parameters.name: skipRecords
parameters.description:
[This field has been deprecated and will be removed in future versions. Use pagenumber and pagesize for pagination purposes. Pagenumber and pagesize does not work with NumberToRead and SkipRecords.]
Tells the service to return only records after the first {skipRecords} number of records.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Equals Customer name.

parameters.description: Drop down and select Status.

parameters.description: Equals Corporate ID from Delivery settings tab.

parameters.name: vatRegistrationId
parameters.description: Equals VAT registration ID from Delivery settings tab.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Equals Email for customer.

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: Equals Phone 1 for customer.

parameters.name: lastModifiedDateTime
parameters.description:
This value, generated by the system, indicates the last time the record was modified. Use it to retrieve all records that have been modified since that time, up to the present.

Accepted format:
* ```yyyy-MM-dd```
* ```yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss```
* ```yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.FFF```
* ```yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss```
* ```yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.FFF```

_Note:_ __LastModifiedDateTime__ and __LastModifiedDateTimeCondition__ are __mutually inclusive__.

parameters.name: lastModifiedDateTimeCondition
parameters.description:
This value represents the condition to be applied when retrieving records.

Accepted values (without the single quotes):
* '>' for greater than
* '<' for less than
* '>=' for greater than or equal
* '<=' for less than or equal

_Note:_ __LastModifiedDateTime__ and __LastModifiedDateTimeCondition__ are __mutually inclusive__.

parameters.description: The dunning level of the document.

parameters.description: The date of the closing of the financial period.

parameters.name: dunningLetterDateTime
parameters.description: The date and time for when the document last released a dunning letter.

parameters.name: dunningLetterDateTimeCondition
parameters.description: Set time/date as before (<), after (>), before and including (=<) OR after and including (=>) to filter on time frame.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: The project with which the document is associated.

parameters.name: expandApplications
parameters.description: True if you want to see all dunning information regarding this document.

parameters.name: expandAttachments
parameters.description: True if you want to see all attachments regarding this document.

parameters.name: expandTaxDetails
parameters.description: True if you want to see all VAT details regarding this document.

parameters.name: expandInvoiceAddress
parameters.description: True if you want to see all information regarding the invoice address for this document.

parameters.name: financialPeriod
parameters.description: The financial period to which the transactions recorded in the document is posted. Format YYYYMM.

parameters.name: documentDueDate
parameters.description: The date when payment for the document is due, in accordance with the credit terms.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status of the document. Use the dropdown to select status.

parameters.description: This field has been deprecated and will be removed in future versions. Use pagenumber and pagesize for pagination purposes. Pagenumber and pagesize does not work with NumberToRead and SkipRecords.

parameters.description: This field has been deprecated and will be removed in future versions. Use pagenumber and pagesize for pagination purposes. Pagenumber and pagesize does not work with NumberToRead and SkipRecords.

parameters.description: The top part > External reference > The external reference used in AutoInvoice.

parameters.name: paymentReference
parameters.description: The top part > Payment ref. > The reference number of the document, as automatically generated by the system in accordance with the number series assigned to cash sales in the Customer ledger preferences window..

methods.description:
Get a range of Customer Credit Notes - ScreenId=AR301000
Request page size must be lower or equal to the allowed max page size which is returned as part of the metadata information.
If requested page size is greater than allowed max page size, request will be limited to max page size

parameters.name: documentType
parameters.description: The field is deprecated for specific customer document endpoints. It will only be usable from customer document endpoint.

parameters.name: released
parameters.description: Parameter for showing if invoice has been released or not.

parameters.name: dunningLevel
parameters.description: The dunning level of the document.

parameters.name: closedFinancialPeriod
parameters.description: The date of the closing of the financial period.

parameters.name: dunningLetterDateTime
parameters.description: The date and time for when the document last released a dunning letter.

parameters.name: dunningLetterDateTimeCondition
parameters.description: Set time/date as before (<), after (>), before and including (=<) OR after and including (=>) to filter on time frame.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: The project with which the document is associated.

parameters.name: expandApplications
parameters.description: True if you want to see all dunning information regarding this document.

parameters.name: expandAttachments
parameters.description: True if you want to see all attachments regarding this document.

parameters.name: expandTaxDetails
parameters.description: True if you want to see all VAT details regarding this document.

parameters.name: expandInvoiceAddress
parameters.description: True if you want to see all information regarding the invoice address for this document.

parameters.name: financialPeriod
parameters.description: The financial period to which the transactions recorded in the document is posted. Format YYYYMM.

parameters.name: documentDueDate
parameters.description: The date when payment for the document is due, in accordance with the credit terms.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status of the document. Use the dropdown to select status.

parameters.name: numberToRead
parameters.description: This field has been deprecated and will be removed in future versions. Use pagenumber and pagesize for pagination purposes. Pagenumber and pagesize does not work with NumberToRead and SkipRecords.

parameters.name: skipRecords
parameters.description: This field has been deprecated and will be removed in future versions. Use pagenumber and pagesize for pagination purposes. Pagenumber and pagesize does not work with NumberToRead and SkipRecords.

parameters.name: externalReference
parameters.description: The top part > External reference > The external reference used in AutoInvoice.

parameters.name: paymentReference
parameters.description: The top part > Payment ref. > The reference number of the document, as automatically generated by the system in accordance with the number series assigned to cash sales in the Customer ledger preferences window..

parameters.name: customerRefNumber
parameters.description: The top part > External reference > The external reference used in AutoInvoice.

parameters.name: greaterThanValue
parameters.description: Greater than value. The item which is the object for this, varies from API to API.

parameters.name: lastModifiedDateTime
parameters.description:
This value, generated by the system, indicates the last time the record was modified. Use it to retrieve all records that have been modified since that time, up to the present.

Accepted format:
* ```yyyy-MM-dd```
* ```yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss```
* ```yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.FFF```
* ```yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss```
* ```yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.FFF```

_Note:_ __LastModifiedDateTime__ and __LastModifiedDateTimeCondition__ are __mutually inclusive__.

parameters.name: lastModifiedDateTimeCondition
parameters.description:
This value represents the condition to be applied when retrieving records.

Accepted values (without the single quotes):
* '>' for greater than
* '<' for less than
* '>=' for greater than or equal
* '<=' for less than or equal

_Note:_ __LastModifiedDateTime__ and __LastModifiedDateTimeCondition__ are __mutually inclusive__.

parameters.name: createdDateTime
parameters.description: Creation date and time.

parameters.name: createdDateTimeCondition
parameters.description: System-retrieved information for state/condition

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Pagination parameter. Page number.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description:
Pagination parameter. Number of items to be collected.
Please use a page size lower or equal to the allowed max page size which is returned as part of the metadata information.
If requested page size is greater than allowed max page size, request will be limited to max page size.

parameters.name: erpApiBackground
parameters.description: If a URL value is provided, then API endpoint will be queued and executed in background. When the execution of the background operation is finished, the system will POST the response to the specified URL. The endpoint itself responds in this case with a 202-Accepted status and a reference to a state document for the background operation.

parameters.name: lastModifiedDateTime
parameters.description:
This value, generated by the system, indicates the last time the record was modified. Use it to retrieve all records that have been modified since that time, up to the present.

Accepted format:
* ```yyyy-MM-dd```
* ```yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss```
* ```yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.FFF```
* ```yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss```
* ```yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.FFF```

_Note:_ __LastModifiedDateTime__ and __LastModifiedDateTimeCondition__ are __mutually inclusive__.

parameters.name: lastModifiedDateTimeCondition
parameters.description:
This value represents the condition to be applied when retrieving records.

Accepted values (without the single quotes):
* '>' for greater than
* '<' for less than
* '>=' for greater than or equal
* '<=' for less than or equal

_Note:_ __LastModifiedDateTime__ and __LastModifiedDateTimeCondition__ are __mutually inclusive__.

parameters.name: lastModifiedDateTime
parameters.description:
This value, generated by the system, indicates the last time the record was modified. Use it to retrieve all records that have been modified since that time, up to the present.

Accepted format:
* ```yyyy-MM-dd```
* ```yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss```
* ```yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.FFF```
* ```yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss```
* ```yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.FFF```

_Note:_ __LastModifiedDateTime__ and __LastModifiedDateTimeCondition__ are __mutually inclusive__.

parameters.name: lastModifiedDateTimeCondition
parameters.description:
This value represents the condition to be applied when retrieving records.

Accepted values (without the single quotes):
* '>' for greater than
* '<' for less than
* '>=' for greater than or equal
* '<=' for less than or equal

_Note:_ __LastModifiedDateTime__ and __LastModifiedDateTimeCondition__ are __mutually inclusive__.

parameters.name: lastModifiedDateTime
parameters.description:
This value, generated by the system, indicates the last time the record was modified. Use it to retrieve all records that have been modified since that time, up to the present.

Accepted format:
* ```yyyy-MM-dd```
* ```yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss```
* ```yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.FFF```
* ```yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss```
* ```yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.FFF```

_Note:_ __LastModifiedDateTime__ and __LastModifiedDateTimeCondition__ are __mutually inclusive__.

parameters.name: lastModifiedDateTimeCondition
parameters.description:
This value represents the condition to be applied when retrieving records.

Accepted values (without the single quotes):
* '>' for greater than
* '<' for less than
* '>=' for greater than or equal
* '<=' for less than or equal

_Note:_ __LastModifiedDateTime__ and __LastModifiedDateTimeCondition__ are __mutually inclusive__.

methods.description:
This will create 0..n PO based on SO according to the following rules for the lines on the SO
- Only issue lines
- Only create PO based on lines with supplier
- Create PO (0..n) for each supplier on the SO lines
- Create PO type purchase/drop shipment based on PO Source on SO line
- If no supplier on inventory item exist the SO line will not have a corresponding PO line (response should point to lines with no supplier in either SO line or inventory item)
- If 'createPurchaseOrderActionDto.preferSupplierFromSOLine' is false then the default supplier for SOLine inventory item will be used if any
- If 'createPurchaseOrderActionDto.preferSupplierFromSOLine' is true then the supplier from the SOLine inventory item will be used; if there is no supplier on SOLine then the default supplier for SOLine inventory item will be used if any

parameters.description: Reference number of the sale oreder from which the purchase order will be created
